mapper.select: select i.*, concat(a.app_key,"&",i.interface_name) as key_name from app_id_meta as a join interface_instance as i on a.app_id = i.app_id;
select i.* ,concat(a.app_key,"&",i.interface_name) as key_name from app_id_meta as a join interface_instance as i on a.app_id = i.app_id where a.app_key =#{appKey};
